entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
